abstract: Instead of using the international break to work on the problems that have left them at the bottom of the Premier League, Blackburn Rovers flew to India for a commercial tour set up by its owners, Venky's.
snippet: Instead of using the international break to work on the problems that have left them at the bottom of the Premier League, Blackburn Rovers flew to India for a commercial tour set up by its owners, Venky's.
lead_paragraph: Under ordinary circumstances Steve Kean surely would have been grateful for the timing of this week's international break.

headline.main: Blackburn Is in India. The Question Is: Why?
